author: redzeno
content: Hey Guys, bit of a novice question. Will ETH validator PoS requirements ever be reduced from 32ETH? If not will there be a way to trustlessly stake less than 32ETH ?

author: pietjepuk
content:
> Will ETH validator PoS requirements ever be reduced from 32ETH
Probably not for the foreseeable future

> If not will there be a way to trustlessly stake less than 32ETH ?
That is definitely the idea yes! Some functionality needed for that was recently merged to the spec, but there's still more work to be done.

author: chris2_2_2
content: Rocketpool allows for mini pools where you stake 16 eth and 16 eth comes from them in trust.
